description: Surrounded by a group of three Mankey`s in a park in Vermilion City, it`s bone was taken by stolen by them. Goh saw what happened and came to the rescue and said they`d help it find the bone. After searching the park, a Fearow showed up and took them to an area where the Mankey were playing with the bone and explained that they threw it into a lake, Goh`s Dewgong was able to find it. Cubone wanted to become friends with Goh and he caught it.
name: Karakara (Gou)
